P113160.project_name: MONSTAT: Strengthening the National Statistical System of Mongolia

project_abstract.cdata: The main objective of the Strengthening the National Statistical System Project for Mongolia (MONSTAT) is to improve efficiency and effectiveness of the national statistical system of Mongolia to enable it to provide relevant, timely and reliable data for evidence-based policy making in support of Government. The financing plan has been changed based on the request received from the National Statistical Office (NSO). The unallocated funds will be used for the remaining operations and staff salary as follows: reallocate 23.5 percent or SDR 14,058 of the 'unallocated fund' to the first category-goods and consultants' services for A through D components; and reallocate 76.5 percent or SDR 45,942 of the 'unallocated fund' to the second category-goods, consultants' service and incremental operating costs for part E of the project.
